description:
Put yourself in the paws of the world’s cheekiest feline and turn Granny's peaceful home into your own chaotic playground! In Angry Cat, you’ll sneak, scratch, and smash your way through a fully interactive 3D house filled with secrets, surprises, and, most importantly, breakable items.

Cause mischief everywhere: knock over vases, scratch furniture, steal snacks, and outsmart Granny before she catches you. Each prank earns you laughs, chaos points, and hilarious reactions from your not-so-patient human.

Customize your cat with different skins and outfits. Unlock new rooms and discover hidden shortcuts as you claw your way from the living room to the attic and beyond! With smooth first-person controls and funny animations, every level is a new chance to sharpen your claws and stir up trouble, all while Granny is hot on your tail.

Do you have what it takes to be the ultimate prankster cat? Get ready to break the rules, dodge Granny’s wrath, and cause the funniest mayhem ever!
